data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of `Asir that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of `Asir.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,100,505 who are far from you in ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Faifi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Faifi people know you.
Father, encourage the 11,588 believers in `Asir to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of `Asir hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia has a population of 2,188,500.

We estimate `Asir has 11,588 people who might know Jesus, 76,407 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,100,505 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 188 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of ‘Asir, Saudi Arabia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
